Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Milestones.Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires the state athletic commission to promulgate regulations for authorized combined professional and amateur mixed martial arts events
Summary: Requires the state athletic commission to promulgate regulations for authorized combined professional and amateur mixed martial arts events no later than June 30, 2025.
ActClause: AN ACT to require the state athletic commission to promulgate regulations for authorized combined professional and amateur mixed martial arts events
